title: Alberta enters second month of COVID-19 pandemic with 3:30 p.m. update - CTV News

content: EDMONTON The Alberta government reported new cases of COVID and one more death Monday There are now cases of the novel coronavirus in Alberta one month after the province reported its first case A total of Albertans have recovered from chars
